description:
healow™ lets you communicate with your doctor’s office and access up to date medical records. You will be able to access your appointments, lab results, vitals, manage medications and other personal data all within one app. From the healow™ app you can manage multiple accounts and access your and your family’s medical information. 
Find a doctor and book your appointment - fast, free & easy, at your convenience – morning, noon or late at night! No more waiting on the phone with your doctor's office for an appointment. Find an appointment that works for you and book instantly – on the go!
Set your goals and track them easily using trackers. Use our weight management & activity trackers to reach your fitness goals. Track your numbers regularly to watch the trends change and share your progress with your doctor. Stay motivated to make healthy choices.

Solve medical cases. Practice real-world diagnosis. Build clinical confidence.

Atrium is a gamified learning platform where you improve your diagnostic and decision-making skills by solving authentic patient scenarios.

Whether you're just starting clinical work or already in practice, Atrium challenges you to think like a doctor — every day, in just a few minutes.

---

How the Game Works

1. Meet the Patient:
Get a brief with presenting symptoms, history, and vitals.

2. Order Tests:
Select the investigations you think are necessary. Avoid over-testing.

3. Make the Diagnosis:
Choose the correct diagnosis — and add comorbidities when relevant.

4. Treat the Patient:
Decide on the most appropriate next steps for treatment or referral.

5. Get Your Score:
Performance is scored based on diagnostic accuracy and management quality.

---

What You'll Learn

* Clinical reasoning and pattern recognition
* Selecting relevant investigations
* Accurate diagnosis formulation
* Management planning based on diagnosis
* Avoiding common diagnostic pitfalls

Each case ends with a structured Learnings from the Case section, including:

* Correct Diagnosis
* Key Learning Points
* Common Pitfalls
* Things to Remember
* Flashcards for Review

---

Stay Engaged With Gameplay

* Daily Streaks: Build consistency and earn rewards.
* Trophies: Win trophies for mastering specialties, streaks, and milestones.
* Seniority Levels: Rise through medical ranks — from Intern to Super Specialist.
* Streak Freeze: Missed a day? Keep your streak intact with a freeze.
* Leagues: Compete with others and move up or down based on weekly performance.
* XP and Coins: Earn XP and coins for every case you solve — use them to unlock rewards.

---

Why Atrium Works

* Built around real patient workflows
* Designed to simulate decision-making, not just recall
* Quick sessions: solve cases in 2–3 minutes
* Immediate feedback and structured learning
* Created by experienced doctors and educators
* Engaging UI inspired by the best learning apps

This isn't about rote memorization. It's about building habits, making better decisions, and learning to think like a clinician — every single day.

---

Who Should Use Atrium

Atrium is for anyone who wants to sharpen their diagnostic and clinical thinking — whether you're in training, actively practicing, or revisiting clinical medicine after a break.

It's not tied to any curriculum, textbook, or exam. Just practical, day-to-day medicine delivered in an engaging, repeatable format.

---

Start Your Journey Today

You can begin with just one case. But soon, solving cases will become the most powerful habit in your clinical learning.

Download Atrium and try your first case now.

Medical Disclaimer: This app is intended for educational purposes only. It does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional before making medical decisions.

Terms of Use: https://www.atrium.clinic/terms_and_conditions.html

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets

Pregnancy Guides & Information

► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity

Organise & Plan

► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail

► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.

Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!

Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!

Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates

TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS
Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.

IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE
Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.

PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER
Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.

NEW CHALLENGES 
Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!

LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS
Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide. 

EARN CME CREDIT
Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.


FEATURED APP STORE REVIEWS

Fun and Educational
“I’m in nursing school and my partner is in medical school. We play for fun and it teaches a lot, certainly makes you think more and how not to order everything under the sun. Highly recommend!”
—Kirsten9008

Exactly what EM needed
“Happened to stumble upon the app when I was looking for virtual EM sim learning. It’s exactly what I was looking for. It’s well developed and thought out with pertinent information. Thank you!”
— ariamour

Worth every penny!
“For those looking for a simple but entertaining way to study and prepare for clerkships, think through cases in residency, or even prepare for your oral boards, I think Full Code is the learning tool for you…Thank you, Full Code, for being a long-time study partner! Looking forward to your continued dedication to medical education!”
— Hartridge


FOLLOW FULL CODE

Facebook: facebook.com/fullcodemedical
Twitter: @fullcodemedical
Instagram: @fullcodemedical
TikTok: @fullcodemedical
Website: fullcodemedical.com
Play on desktop: app.fullcodemedical.com

Glucose Tracker is built for tracking blood sugar, A1C, medications and more. This makes it easy to identify trends and retain your data. It is simple to continue tracking weight and blood pressure. You can also schedule reminders to ensure that you are diligent about checking your blood sugar. Whether you have diabetes or prediabetes, this app makes it easy to track your blood glucose levels. Glucose also offers an estimated A1C calculator to help keep you on track in between lab measurements.

The app also tracks what time of day you are checking your blood sugar, such as first thing in the morning, before a meal, or before bed. You can also add a note to each record.

Glucose Tracker also allows you to track insulin, medication, A1C, blood pressure, carbohydrates, weight and ketones. It is a comprehensive app for both diabetics and prediabetics. You can also sync data between devices, export a report for a loved one or a health care professional, and even view a graph of your data. The app also has configurable reminders to check your blood glucose levels. This helps you make sure to check these levels to stay in control of your diabetes. Tracking has never been easier.

Glucose Tracker integrates with HealthKit by writing all inputted entries to the Health app.

Be in charge of your diabetes! Blood sugar tracking has never been this easy!

This diabetes tracker also has an estimated A1C level. Please note that this is just an estimate and should never be used for diagnostic purposes.

Terms of Service: https://www.glucoseforiphone.com/terms-of-service

developer: PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED
description:
Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing 

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!

With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months 
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy 
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary

and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information: 
•	Baby development,
•	Mother’s body,
•	Mom’s meals,
•	Useful tips.
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

Join the #1 Pregnancy & Baby Tracker App that’s Trusted by Millions for Week-by-Week Guidance and Baby Tracking Tools.

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.

During Pregnancy

* Due Date Calculator that determines your due date based on last period, IVF transfer, conception, and ultrasound, while sharing fun facts about your baby
* Week-by-week pregnancy tracker with info about baby development, symptoms and family preparation tips
* Themed baby size comparisons, visual countdown and 3D videos showing baby development in utero week by week of pregnancy
* Helpful daily tips designed to support you at every stage
* Keep track of your bump, symptoms, pregnancy weight, kick counts, birth plan and memories with our My Journal tool
* Expert-reviewed articles on signs of labor, pregnancy symptoms, baby and mom’s health and helpful tips
* Registry Builder to help you with your baby list and registry
* Detailed pregnancy and baby product reviews and expert buying guides
* Expecting Twins? Learn about different types of twins and possible fetal positions
* Use the contractions counter to track the frequency and duration of contractions

After Baby’s Arrival

* Baby Tracker that lets you time and track baby’s feedings, log pump sessions, diaper changes, tummy time, and more
* Month-by-month and milestone tracker for each step of your baby’s life, from the newborn to the toddler stage
* Daily tips tailored  to your baby’s age, stage, your postpartum recovery, and your parenting journey
* Record your postpartum symptoms and medications 
* Informative videos and articles about sleep schedules, feeding tips, milestones, and baby’s growth and week-by-week development
* Medically reviewed articles and info about baby’s health, doctor’s appointments and vaccines
* Join community groups meet people with due dates in the same month, newborn care, mom’s health conditions, parenting styles and more

Family Planning

* Ovulation Calculator that pinpoints your most fertile days based on last period and cycle
* Due Date Calculator that helps you figure out baby’s potential due date when you’re trying to conceive (TTC)
* Ovulation tracker and early pregnancy signs, plus keep a journal of your feelings when you’re trying to get pregnant
* Expert advice and articles to help you understand your cycle, signs of ovulation and pregnancy, fertility issues, adoption and surrogacy, and more
* Community groups devoted to preparing for pregnancy and fertility treatments

About Us 

All content on the What to Expect app is accurate, up-to-date, and reviewed by medical experts, including the What to Expect Medical Review Board. It aligns with current health guidelines and Heidi Murkoff’s trusted books 

Medical information comes from expert sources like ACOG, AAP, CDC, and peer-reviewed journals to ensure reliability and credibility.

For more about What to Expect's medical review and editorial policy, visit: https://www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/
Do not sell my info: https://dsar.whattoexpect.com/

Use our pregnancy tracker app to help nurture a happy, healthy pregnancy & baby! Let’s connect:
* Instagram: @whattoexpect
* Twitter: @WhatToExpect
* Facebook: facebook.com/whattoexpect
* Pinterest: pinterest.com/whattoexpect
* TikTok: @whattoexpect

Designed for both smart phones and tablets, this application will help you manage your diabetes better and keep it under control. Whether you are Type 1 or Type 2, have Gestational Diabetes or just want to help and monitor a family member, this is the logbook app for you.
 
The application tracks almost all aspects of the diabetes treatment and provides you with detailed reports, charts and statistics. You can send the reports to your supervising physician via email. Diabetes:M also gives you various tools, so you can find the trends in blood glucose levels.
 
It also has a vast nutrition database, to help you keep track of your food intake and nutrition information, as well as exercise time.
 
Diabetes:M can analyze the values from the imported data from various glucometers and insulin pumps via the exported files from their respective diabetes management software systems.
 
APPLE WATCH APP AVAILABLE
With our Apple Watch app you can get even more out of Diabetes:M:
 
- Overview – check carbs and calories intake for the current day, as well as latest insulin doses.
- Log new entries – you can log glucose, carbs, proteins, fats, calories and insulin taken right on your wrist! 
 
APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION
Sync health data from thousands of apps via Health app, including: Dexcom, One Touch, Accu-Chek, Agamatrix, iHealth, Dario, Garmin, Fitbit, Nike+, UP by Jawbone, Misfit, Pebble, Human, Strava, My Fitness Pal, Lose it!, Lark, Weight Watchers, Withings
 
PHYSICAL HARM DISCLAIMER
The information and statistical data provided by this application is only to help with the tracking of how the treatment affects the overall diabetes condition. All decisions about the diabetes therapy must be taken after consulting with a doctor.
 
JURISDICTIONAL STATEMENT
- Diabetes:M is an ISO 13485 certified product, that meets maximum requirements for safety, security and quality.
- Diabetes:M is licensed by Nipro Diagnostics to connect to Nipro's 4Sure and 4Sure Smart meters.
- Diabetes:M is a standalone software for tracking diabetes condition available in all countries. It does not provide real time monitoring of glucose or any other vital signs. The app can connect via Bluetooth with some devices available in the EU and USA. In the other countries the users can use the app as a standalone diabetes diary software and enter the data manually.
 
PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES
If you’re really serious about your health, our subscription plan ($4.99/month) includes:
 
+ No Ads – Subscribing removes all advertising from the app, so you can concentrate on what is important.
+ Expanded Food Database 
+ Reports - Get your reports in PDF or XLS format
+ Many others
 
-- Additional information -- 
 
• To unlock additional server functions Diabetes:M requires registration and subscription
• Subscriptions are available on a 1 month ($4.99), 3 months ($13.99), 6 months ($24.99) and 12 months ($49.99) basis
• Subscription payment is charged to a user’s iTunes account at confirmation of purchase
• All subscription plans will auto-renew unless the subscription is canceled at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends
• Renewals will be charged to your iTunes account 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period
• Auto-renewals may be canceled by navigating to your account settings after subscription purchase
• Canceled subscription will stop at the end of the current billing cycle
 
Terms and Privacy Policy: https://www.manula.com/manuals/sirma-medical-systems/diabetes-m-user-guide/terms.and.privacy/en/topic/privacy-policy

Pregnancy Tracker by Sprout, trusted by physicians and named a 'Best Pregnancy Tracker' by Forbes Health, is the most innovative app designed to guide you through every step of your pregnancy journey. With stunning interactive 3D baby models, personalised health tracking, and real-time updates, Sprout offers everything parents-to-be need to track their baby’s growth and stay informed.
 
Why You’ll Love Pregnancy Tracker by Sprout:
 
Next-Generation 3D Baby Interaction
• Watch your baby’s real-time development with interactive 3D models, showing lifelike movements and heartbeat.
• Explore each stage of development with an immersive, detailed view of your baby’s growth.
 
Week-by-Week Pregnancy Timeline
• Get personalised, week-by-week insights into your baby’s growth and your own key milestones.
• Create and track your own milestones, customising them with important dates to make your journey truly yours.
 
Daily and Weekly Information
• Receive timely, expert insights on your baby’s growth along with personalised health tips.
• Stay informed with daily updates, tailored to your specific stage of pregnancy.
 
Essential Pregnancy Checklists
• Stay organised with checklists covering everything you’ll need to prepare for your baby’s arrival, including a hospital bag checklist for delivery day.
 
Health & Symptom Tracker
• Log symptoms, track medications, and monitor vitals to ensure both you and your baby are safe.
• Ideal for low-risk and high-risk pregnancies, giving you peace of mind throughout.
 
Pregnancy Journal + PDF eBook
• Capture every special moment in your pregnancy journal and easily create a PDF eBook to share or print as a keepsake.
• Includes 300+ fun prompts to inspire entries and document your journey with belly photos.
 
Kick Counter, Contraction Timer & Weight Tracker
• Easily log your baby’s kicks and movements with the kick counter.
• Prepare for labor with the contraction timer, which tracks contraction patterns as they progress.
• Monitor your weight throughout pregnancy to stay on top of your health goals.
 
Visual Birth Plan Generator
• Create a detailed birth plan, outlining your preferences for labor, delivery, and newborn care.
• Export and share it directly with your healthcare provider.
 
Apple Watch & iOS Widget
• View 3D baby models and track pregnancy updates directly from your Apple Watch and iOS Widget.
• Stay connected to your baby’s progress anywhere, anytime!
 
No Account Required
• Just download and start tracking your pregnancy instantly—no sign-up necessary.
 
Sprout is Physician-Recommended
"Sprout Pregnancy is a really user friendly guide from conception to delivery. It is very comprehensive and accessible and I would recommend this iPhone app to any friend going through pregnancy for the first time."
— Lynne Robinson MB ChB MD MRCOG, Sub Speciality Registrar, Reproductive Medicine, Birmingham Women's Hospital
 
About Sprout
At Sprout, we’re parents like you, committed to creating apps that empower you during every stage of your pregnancy. We design easy-to-use, powerful tools that help you stay organised, monitor your health, and follow your baby’s progress. Our award-winning apps guide you from the first trimester through delivery.
 
Check out our other highly-rated apps: Baby Tracker by Sprout, Fertility & Period Tracker by Sprout, and Health & Medication Tracker by Sprout.
 
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: https://sprout-apps.com/privacy-policy.html

Your study and clinical companion. Get fast, reliable answers to clinical questions while studying, preparing for exams, or managing patients. 

IMPRESS YOUR ATTENDING & PROVIDE EXCELLENT PATIENT CARE WITH AMBOSS

- Find the answers you need with the AMBOSS Knowledge app. It works offline so you can use it in the hospital and on the go. 
- Interpret key clinical findings on diagnostic images with image overlays. 
- Stay on top of every patient with evidence-based patient-care tools, such as diagnostic flowcharts, acute management checklists, drug dosing, clinical calculators, warning signs, and more.
- Make quick decisions confidently, so you can spend more time with your patients.

ACE YOUR MEDICAL SCHOOL EXAMS 

- Be prepared for every exam (in-house, USMLE® Step, or NBME® Shelf exams) with expertly-created high-yield content that covers the entire USMLE® content outline. 
- Connect your Anki flashcards to the AMBOSS library and remember everything you learn. You’ll get pop-up explanations of medical terms and images right there in your Anki decks. Now available on mobile.
- The library content is designed for quick and easy access so you can find the relevant info you need in seconds. And if you want to dive deeper for a more thorough understanding of the topic at hand, all you need to do is click.
- Succeed on Shelf exams and honor clinical rotations with the Clerkship Survival Guides and clinical content. 
-  The AMBOSS Qbank app is the ideal way to apply your knowledge and become a top-tier test-taker with its learning features. It is available as a separate app. Once downloaded, both AMBOSS apps integrate seamlessly with each other for a complete studying experience. 

*AMBOSS users score higher on exams and perform better in the hospital. Learn more here. 

GETTING STARTED 

- Create your account at amboss.com/us
- Download the AMBOSS Medical Knowledge Library app.
- Once that’s done, you’ll have 5 days to explore the platform for FREE.
- When your 5-day free trial is up, choose the membership that’s right for you and become part of the AMBOSS medical community.

IN CASE YOU NEED HELP

If you have any questions, check out our Help Center or get in touch and we’ll be happy to assist.
support.amboss.com/hc/en-us

Analyze snoring, talking, sounds, and more. Track your night like never before!
Awake or deep, light sleep too, Track it all—it’s made for you.

→ High-quality sleep audio recordings.
→ Make every morning a data-rich start to a well-rested day!
→ Get useful in-depth analysis and a tailored sleep experience with Prime Sleep Recorder.

Have less stress and listen to your snoring symphony or sleep-talking highlights. 
See the charts every morning. App with unique features and technologies to analyze your sleep and  improve the quality of your rest.

INSIGHTFUL MORNINGS
Just one click and Prime Sleep Recorder will collects and evaluates data, providing you with valuable insights every morning when you wake up.

TECHNOLOGY
Prime Sleep Recorder optimizes microphone sensitivity, utilizing your phone's hardware for precise sleep analysis through AI, providing accurate and visualized sleep data.

SCIENCE
Snore detection is powered by Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) with the support of a new Apple machine-learning technology. By using a large number of snoring and sleeping samples from various users, we are able to deliver a precise sleep analysis tailored to each individual in statistics and in snoring detection. Your personalized evaluation is crafted based on the vast dataset, ensuring a unique and tailored experience for every user.

HIGHLIGHTS:
▷ PERSONAL SLEEP SYMPHONY RECORDING
▷ EASY TO USE
▷ HIGH TECH SNORING DETECTION
Accurate snoring detection based on A.I.
▷ ONE CLICK POSSIBILITY TO RECORD ONLY SNORING
▷ LIFESTYLE FACTORS, WAKE-UP MOOD, NOTES
Assign factors (alcohol, coffee, stress, etc.) to each night and the mood after waking up, or add your own notes.
▷ AUDIO VISUALIZATION DURING RECORDING OR PLAYING
▷ MEMORY SAVING SYSTEM ON YOUR PHONE
aac audio compression for the best ratio quality and size
▷ EASY SHARING OF YOUR SLEEP SYMPHONY WITH YOUR FRIENDS:

The AMBOSS Qbank App for USMLE® Step, NBME® Shelf, NBOME® COMLEX-USA, ABIM, ABFM, ABP exams is the ultimate test preparation and study resource for medical students and residents. Dive into thousands of questions to enhance your knowledge and prepare for all of your exams.

The AMBOSS Qbank App will rigorously prepare you for the USMLE Step 1, Step 2 CK, Step 2 CS, Step 3, NBME Subject Board (Shelf) exams, and your clerkships, COMLEX Level 1, Level 2-CE, Level 3 and COMAT — Osteopathic principles and practice along with NEJM Knowledge+ questions for ABIM, ABFM, and ABP Board Review.

AMBOSS Qbank App works online and offline, so you can answer questions and reinforce your knowledge anytime, anywhere. It’s cross-linked with the AMBOSS Knowledge App so you can practice questions in the Qbank while simultaneously looking up relevant terms in the AMBOSS Knowledge Library. 


AMBOSS Knowledge and AMBOSS Qbank Apps combine to give you one powerful exam-preparation resource.

With AMBOSS Qbank App, you can:

Stay on track: Use Study Mode to guide your learning process. The Key Info and Attending Tip are tools that will help you with challenging questions and nudge you in the right direction when needed.
Bridge any knowledge gaps: After a Qbank session, you’ll get a personal analysis and study recommendations that will show you the areas you need to focus on the most.

Perform under pressure: Test yourself with Exam-Mode and be prepared for USMLE and Shelf exam conditions.
Get more than questions: Dive into interactive image overlays and flowcharts to improve your learning, study smarter, and score higher.
Additionally, the cross-linked AMBOSS Knowledge App will give you easy access to the right information.

Download the app today!

МедТочка — это личный кабинет пациента с защищённой электронной медкартой, которую легко показать любому врачу.



- Храните медицинские документы в своей электронной медкарте



Больше никаких папок с бумагами: результаты обследований, заключения врача и назначения — всё в одном приложении. МедТочка позволяет хранить медицинские документы всей семьи и безопасно открывать доступ к своей медкарте любому врачу на приёме или онлайн.



- Планируйте, переносите или отменяйте запись на приём



Записывайтесь на приём онлайн через приложение МедТочка — это быстро и удобно. А если планы изменились, просто перенесите или отмените запись в один клик. 



- Отслеживайте цикл и заботьтесь о репродуктивном здоровье



«Женский календарь» в МедТочке – удобный инструмент, который помогает контролировать цикл и следить за самочувствием. Данные о цикле можно безопасно передавать врачу напрямую из приложения. Отмечайте симптомы, а МедТочка подскажет, какие из них являются тревожными и когда нужно обратиться к доктору.



- Подключайтесь к телемедицинским консультациям



Консультируйтесь с врачом из любой точки мира прямо в приложении МедТочка. Общайтесь в чате или по видеосвязи, если нужно получить рекомендации или узнать второе мнение по вашему лечению.



- Записывайтесь на приём со скидкой 30% с Клубом ПроДокторов 



В МедТочке можно следить за своим статусом участника Клуба ПроДокторов и сроком его действия, а также получать и хранить все скидочные купоны.



- Оставляйте отзывы на врачей



Поделитесь своим мнением о приёме на сайте ПроДокторов. Информация об отзыве автоматически появится в МедТочке: вы сможете проверить статус отзыва и после публикации узнать, скольким людям ваш опыт помог выбрать врача.



- Также МедТочка помогает:



· Вовремя приходить к врачу: приложение напомнит вам накануне приёма
· Получать рекомендации по подготовке к приёму
· Быстро находить профили любимых врачей и клиник в избранном



- Мы гарантируем безопасность ваших данных 


МедТочка надёжно сохранит ваши документы и обеспечит безопасность медицинских данных с помощью шифрования.



Скачайте приложение следите за здоровьем вместе с МедТочкой

The Otto app lets pet owners conveniently connect with their veterinarian clinic to get the best care for their pets. Easily chat with your clinic, manage appointments and stay synced on your pet’s health.


With the Otto app, you can:
*Request appointments, prescription refills, or follow up after appointments
*Access and share pet vaccine information with other service providers, such as your groomer or boarder
*Chat with your clinic to ask pet health questions
*See upcoming appointments and reminders as well as information about previous visits
*Digitally check in for appointments
*Complete payments for appointments or pre-pay for upcoming services
*Conveniently video chat with your clinic



With the TeleVet™ feature of the Otto app included in Care memberships at participating clinics, you'll receive 24/7/365 access to veterinary professionals to help triage pet health concerns and get appointments booked your veterinarian when needed.- Note that your clinic must also be using Otto software in order to make use of this app. Interested in getting your clinic on Otto? This app allows you to interact with the NightOwl sensor that measures signals from your index finger with a small light sensor to check if you have sleep-related breathing disorders.  

You can set up the test in a few minutes using the in-app instructional videos. Wear the sensor for the prescribed number of nights to complete the test. 

Disclaimer: This app may provide information from external medical devices. Before making any medical decisions based on this information, read the device instructions carefully and speak with your healthcare provider.

Glass is the best‑in‑class AI clinical decision support (CDS) co‑pilot for clinicians. Glass generates answers to clinical questions, high-quality differential diagnoses, and evidence‑based treatment plans in seconds — decreasing diagnostic errors and improving patient outcomes.

Clinicians using Glass experience...

- **Zero knowledge gaps** – instant, peer‑reviewed answers at the bedside.
- **Diagnostic clarity** – high‑yield differentials for complex cases.
- **Guideline‑directed treatment** – patient‑specific plans aligned with society recommendations.
- **Effortless documentation** – polished notes generated in seconds, saving endless hours.

Whether you’re on rounds or in clinic, Glass delivers the precision, clarity, and confidence you need to excel—and to give every patient the care they deserve.

Download today and experience the future of AI CDS.

Disclaimer: Glass is a clinical decision support application is intended solely for use by licensed healthcare professionals. The app provides evidence‑based clinical decision‑support drafts with evidence-based in-text citations—including differential diagnoses, management considerations, and treatment‑plan drafts—for clinician review. Glass does not provide patient‑facing medical advice, diagnose patients, or determine treatment. All output must be verified and adapted by a qualified clinician before any patient care decisions are made. By using Glass, you attest that you are a licensed clinician and agree not to rely on the app’s content without applying your own professional judgement.

At Ovia Health by Labcorp, we’re here to empower women at every stage of their health journey—from your period through fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, perimenopause, menopause, and beyond.    With personalized tools and data-driven insights, Ovia empowers women to make informed decisions and access the care they need, whenever they need it.
Whether you're tracking your period, trying to get pregnant, monitoring your pregnancy, recovering postpartum, navigating perimenopause, or tracking your health, join millions of Ovia users.

Consistently rated one of the best women’s health apps, Ovia helps you stay on top of all your women’s health needs – in one trusted place! 

YOUR HEALTH IN YOUR HANDS
◆ Personalized email summaries and reminders to help you make the most of your experience and manage your health
◆ Period & Fertility calendar - Fertility forecasting algorithm predicts your fertility windows & ovulation cycles.
◆ Pregnancy - Baby growth calendar, due date countdown, bump and fetal movement tracker, and more. Watch your baby grow, track your symptoms, and learn what to expect each week.
◆ Postpartum Experience - personalized recovery modes based on delivery (vaginal, c-section, VBAC), symptom tracking, and more.
◆ Perimenopause & Menopause support - comprehensive health tracking for real-time alerts & personalized feedback.
◆ Access over 2,000 free expert articles on fertility, ovulation, conception, postpartum, menopause & reproductive health.

OVULATION CALCULATOR & FERTILITY TRACKER
◆ Fertile window and ovulation time predictions & a daily fertility score. An ovulation app that helps you know when you’re ovulating when trying to conceive (TTC).


PERIOD AND MENSTRUAL CYCLE TRACKER
◆ A period tracker with customizable data logging including symptoms, moods, sex, and nutrition.
◆ Support for regular & irregular menstrual cycles.
◆ Birth control tracking

PREGNANCY & POSTPARTUM
◆ A personalized, 12-month program focused on birth recovery, postpartum conditions and complications, reproductive planning, return to work support, mental health, & more.

PERIMENOPAUSE & MENOPAUSE SUPPORT
◆ Symptom and mood tracking, education, and support to navigate perimenopause & menopause confidently.

STAY UP TO DATE ON YOUR PREGNANCY WITH ESSENTIALS
◆ Pregnancy Week by Week: Know what to expect each week with a baby due date countdown and weekly videos and content about pregnancy symptoms, body changes, & baby tips.
◆ Pregnancy Tracker & Baby Growth Calendar: Compare your baby’s weekly size to a fruit, toy, pastry item, or animal. View 3D illustrations of your baby each week & track baby’s growth.
◆ My Baby Names: Swipe through thousands of baby names. Save your favorites.
◆ Baby Hand & Foot Size: See a life-size image of how big your baby's hands and feet are today compared to how big they'll be at your due date!
◆ Bump Tracker: Keep a record of your growing baby bump.
◆ Safety Lookup Tools: Use lookup tools for symptoms & food safety.
◆ Kick Counter & Contraction Timer: Count baby kicks & contractions as your due date approaches.

OTHER FEATURES OUR MEMBERS LOVE
◆ Friends & Family Sharing: Add your spouse, partner, sibling, or your BFF to share your daily updates.
◆ Privacy & Security: Add an extra layer of protection by adding a PIN to your account.
◆ Apple Health & Fitbit Integrations: Share data from Ovia to the Apple Health app. Sync your Fitbit to share steps, sleep & weight with Ovia.

OVIA HEALTH BY LABCORP
Ovia Health by Labcorp is the leading digital health companion for women across their entire health journey, from general and preventive health through perimenopause and menopause.

Приложение StoreMed предоставляет полную информацию об анализах в одном месте и помогает легко ориентироваться в целях назначения обследований при визитах к врачу.


Что вы найдёте в приложении:
- Библиотека анализов для каждого органа, чтобы знать, какие исследования необходимо пройти для профилактики и диагностики.
- Важные инструкции по подготовке к анализам, включая советы за месяц, неделю и день до сдачи.
- Встроенный шагомер, позволяющий отслеживать вашу физическую активность и поддерживать здоровье.
- Проверка родинок и кожи с помощью технологии Skinive для своевременного скрининга и диагностики.


Приложение StoreMed делает заботу о здоровье простой и удобной, обеспечивая вас всей необходимой информацией для профилактики и анализа состояния организма.
